Activity: Check emails. Review all animations and ensure they meet quality standards.
Polish animations, adding subtle details like secondary motion and facial expressions.
Take a break. Reflect on the week's progress and personal growth.
Prepare a presentation or demo of the animations for the team.
Present animations to the team during the weekly meeting and gather final feedback.
Make any last-minute adjustments based on team feedback.
Document all changes and finalize files for submission.
Plan for next week's tasks and relax.
